name: Young Professional

demographics.ageGroup: Single or newly married individuals (25-35 years old)
demographics.description: Single or newly married individuals (25-35 years old)

behavior: Busy lifestyle, often on the go, and relies heavily on mobile services. Values flexibility and convenience.
needs: High-speed mobile data, unlimited data plans, streaming services for entertainment, and reliable landline for home office.
painpoints: High data usage costs, poor mobile signal in certain areas, and the need for seamless integration between mobile and home services.
